title: Lalalark Chop 'N Flip - Fast Food Station with 40+ Accessories, Interactive Potato Cutter, Simulated Frying Effect & Grilling Lights, Order & Drink Station
features: Interactive Potato Cutter: Press down on the potato to slice it into fries, making pretend play for toddlers engaging and rewarding.
Simulated Frying Effect: With a press of a button, watch the fry area create bubbles for a lifelike pretend play frying experience that complements any play kitchen food set.

Chop 'N Flip - Fast Food Station: Simulate a full fast-food station pretend play and experience with play zones for fry cutting, food prep surfaces, frying, burger grilling, and more. Compact 12.13 x 10.56 x 7.41 inches design includes 40+ Accessories, 8 ingredients, menu guide, play money, tongs, spatula, fries bag, burger wrap, soda cup, sauce bottle, and more for endless fun in your kids play kitchen.

Grilling Sound & Light: Turn on the grill area to see red light effects that mimic the sound and look of sizzling burger patties, adding excitement to your toy kitchen appliances and play food sets for kids kitchen collection.
Order & Packing Play: Use the menu guide and packing bags to simulate ordering and packing up meals with pretend food and toy food, perfect for imaginative pretend play toys.
Soda Station: Includes a drink zone with soda cup and holder to make meals complete with a refreshing drink, enhancing the fun of this play food set and pretend play.
Easy Water Drain Design: Quickly remove water with a convenient button for hassle-free clean-up after play. (3 AAA batteries required, not included).
